stories.title: Charlie Chaplin: The Final Speech from the Great Dictator

stories.text: If you have end-to-end encryption for audio/video, how does captioning work? Is there a way to have group video conversations with E2E and captions? How should we think about this trade-off?
stories.title: Ask HN: Can you have both accessibility and privacy?
Ukrainian leader calls on Tim Cook to block Russian users from the App Store

stories.text: Or maybe they skip code review sometimes (e.g., every other update, etc.)?
stories.title: Ask HN: Do indie devs skip code review because it is not fun?
Nvidia confirms it’s investigating an ‘incident,’ reportedly a cyberattack

stories.text:
I feel like I have to be in a very specific head space to write code. It’s like climbing a big hill but in my head. Sometimes it’s effortless and sometimes it’s a slog.

Are there any proven exercises or techniques I can adopt that are proven to boost my ability to focus and get in that clear headspace to write code?
stories.title: Ask HN: Any scientifically proven techniques to boost concentration?
Elderly driver crushed by tank in Ukraine is miraculously rescued alive
